title: Rapid prototyping ...made easy
description: There are no platform that puts the Maker in the front seat around their ideas, or what a product have been used for after it is sold.
solution: We are building a rapid prototyping platform that will incentivize the Makers and provide a red thread back to the industry.
experience:
Project started in 2012.  
First iterations was built in Drupal 5 to 7, found a better fit with Magento 2 in 2016, smart contracts are pending
